entry.title: Tuesday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 12 with temperature rising to minus 8 by morning. POP 40%
entry.summary: Snow ending early this evening then cloudy with 40 percent chance of flurries. Risk of freezing drizzle this evening and overnight. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 12 with temperature rising to minus 8 by morning. Wind chill minus 15 this evening. Forecast issued 4:00 PM CST Tuesday 27 December 2022

entry.title: Wednesday: Chance of flurries mixed with ice pellets. High minus 3. POP 60%
entry.summary: Cloudy with 60 percent chance of flurries or ice pellets and risk of freezing drizzle. Wind east 20 km/h becoming light in the morning. High minus 3. Wind chill minus 14 in the morning and minus 7 in the afternoon. Forecast issued 4:00 PM CST Tuesday 27 December 2022

entry.title: Wednesday night: Overcast. Temperature steady near minus 3.
entry.summary: Overcast. Risk of freezing drizzle. Fog patches developing after midnight. Wind up to 15 km/h. Temperature steady near minus 3. Wind chill near minus 7. Forecast issued 4:00 PM CST Tuesday 27 December 2022
